name: Beware The Shadows
description:
This is a submission for the 8-bits-to-infinity anything goes jam. Yay!

Creators:

Programming: svenpl, chilibonbon, Leonard B
Art: Rinaii
Music, Sounds: chilibonbon

This is a horro-like tower-defense game. You have to defend your fire pit from the shadows, which want to steal the light. Without light you are lost.
Build defense-towers, upgrade them and fight back the darkness as long as you can.

There is missing a bit of balancing.
